title: The Housefly and its control
brief_description: Describes the anatomy and reproductive cycle of the fly and outlines the steps that can be taken in the city and on the land to control its numbers.
description: Describes the anatomy and reproductive cycle of the fly and outlines the steps that can be taken in the city and on the land to control its numbers.
